snippet: The suspect told detectives after his arrest that the victim had been “blowing kisses” at him and had made a sexual gesture as the two crossed paths in Jackson Heights.
abstract: New York City police say assault on Ever Orozco in Queens that resulted in his stabbing death was random and hate-fueled attack prompted by suspect Steven Torres's belief that Orozco made sexual advances; Torres is charged with second-degree murder as a hate crime and with weapons possession.
lead_paragraph: The suspect told detectives after his arrest that the victim had been “blowing kisses” at him and had made a sexual gesture as the two crossed paths in Jackson Heights.

headline.main: Man Fatally Stabbed by Stranger in Queens Was Victim of Hate Crime, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Man Fatally Stabbed by Stranger in Queens Was Victim of Hate Crime, Police Say
